alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Castle Country; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 4:12AM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph across portions of western Utah may bring a period of blowing and drifting snow late Wednesday night through early Thursday morning. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Sanpete Valley, Castle Country, Upper Sevier River Valleys and Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
